xxl.core.io
Class CounterDataInput

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.CounterDataInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataInput
public class CounterDataInput
extends Object
implements DataInput

Wraps a DataInput and counts the number of bytes which are read. The methods that return a String are not supported.

Field Summary
protected  DataInput di
          The DataInput which is wrapped.
protected  int size
          Number of bytes read so far.
 
Constructor Summary
CounterDataInput(DataInput di)
          Constructs a new DataInput which counts the bytes which are read from a wrapped DataInput object.
